name: EBaC (Electronic Bible and Concordance)
short_description:
Bible Concordance generator and viewer for UNIX/Linux/Cygwin, written in C.
Supports multiple word searches using boolean operators and Reverse Polish notation. Unlike printed concordances, shows complete verse, and in context.
